Headline: Temporary #7 Harrison Reroute near Damen/Polk.
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Loomis, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Western buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Western, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Orleans.
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois and Orleans, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois, Orleans, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Rogers/Ashland
ShortDescription: Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Touhy and Sheridan : due to, street blockage near Rogers/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Touhy and Sheridan : due to, street blockage near Rogers/Ashland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Shuttle buses are available between Clinton and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

Some trains may be held or turned back before reaching the bridge in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route. Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge lift operation. 
Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont due to an unauthorized person on tracks.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont due to an unauthorized person on tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
